title: Should I become a monk? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think nobody can answer your question but you. Read the pros and cons of renouncing the world physically to become a monk. Churn those things early in the morning to decide. But yes, one must not run away from the responsibilities just because we cannot take it. Those responsibilities will haunt you anyway. So, the best thing would be to get inspired from a lotus flower. Be a lotus flower. Attached to water still facing upwards very much detached from the dirty water down there.

No, never. Our Rishi's had written in scripture that “Graisth Ashram” is best place to learn Spirituality and suffering here are treated as one of the Greatest Tapa. Being practical we have family, some responsibities are there to be taken care of. How can we move away from these. There were many Rishi's we had lived a Graisth Life. So first of all you should have real thirst for spirituality, then you pray to God, Definitely you will get the Right Guide Best of luck..
